work.title: Udrundne er de gamle Dage
Gone are the days, they're past and olden

history.p: Nielsen composed the melody in summer 1917 on the request of Højskolebladet, where it appeared for the first time. Later, it appeared in other collections including songs by Nielsen.

incipText.p: Gone are the days, they're past and olden

event.corpName: The Royal Theatre's Choir (Det Kongelige Teaters Kor)
